Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Controller extends Object implements Observer
Controller manages the game's levels, transitions, and menus.

    • goToLevel

      public void goToLevel(String className) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodException, SecurityException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException, IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException
      Transitions to a specified level.
      Parameters:
      className - the fully qualified class name of the level to load.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - if the class cannot be found.
      NoSuchMethodException - if the constructor is not found.
      SecurityException - if access to the constructor is denied.
      InstantiationException - if the level instance cannot be created.
      IllegalAccessException - if the constructor is inaccessible.
      IllegalArgumentException - if invalid arguments are passed.
      InvocationTargetException - if the constructor invocation fails.

    • handleKeyPress

      private void handleKeyPress(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Handles key press events, toggling the pause menu on 'P'.
      Parameters:
      event - the key event to handle.
